artist: Artist: Becky Hawkins; Publisher: Becky Hawkins
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of cruise ship, flotation device, and journal, with designs and text, printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 51 pp.
inscription:
Front cover, black ink marker: 008/100
Title page, black ink marker: for Fly- / Thanks for everything! / -Becky
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: Same Ship, Different Day
